# ziti_posture_check_os (Data Source)

Ziti Posture Check Data Source, type: OS check

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ziti_posture_check_os" "test_posture_check_os" {
  name = "test_os"
}

output "ziti_check_os" {
  value = data.ziti_posture_check_os.test_posture_check_os
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Identifier
- `name` (String) Name of the Posture Check

### Read-Only

- `operating_systems` (Attributes Set) OS List (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--operating_systems))
- `role_attributes` (List of String) Role Attributes
- `tags` (Map of String) Posture Check Tags

<a id="nestedatt--operating_systems"></a>
### Nested Schema for `operating_systems`

Read-Only:

- `type` (String) Type of operating system
- `versions` (List of String) Min version and Max version of the os
